text: Can’t help but smile, knowing that every #Indigenous person, 18+ in BC will be offered a #COVID19 #vaccine in April. This is an important tool for us 2 protect our loved1s. Like 80% + of our #Nuuchahnulth ppl, I 2 live “off-reserve” currently & am patiently waiting my turn.💉 😷 https://t.co/QBEc52mZNF
